alert.note: Alert for Coastal Dixie; Coastal Taylor; Inland Dixie; Inland Taylor; Lafayette (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 26 at 2:14PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN LAFAYETTE... NORTHWESTERN DIXIE AND SOUTHEASTERN TAYLOR COUNTIES THROUGH 245 PM EDT... At 213 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northwest of Steinhatchee, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Steinhatchee, Tennille, Fish Creek, Hines, Howell Place, Jonesboro, Clara, Bird Island, Salem, Carbur, and Jena. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Dixie; Coastal Taylor; Inland Dixie; Inland Taylor; Lafayette
